summary: Completed comprehensive testing of aftersales.pro SaaS platform including backend APIs, frontend UI, and complete user workflows from signup to job lifecycle management

integration_issues.issue: Authentication session timeout during extended testing sessions

design_issues.issue: Some pages show loading spinners but content loads properly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections (hero, features, pricing)
Dashboard displays stats and recent jobs
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Jobs, Team, Branches, Settings)
Settings page with theme toggle and shop info
All 16 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Complete job lifecycle (create → diagnose → repair → close)
